__e: Listen, my friend here, she's worried that I'm gonna say too much.
Isn't it because you knew that it was precisely the thing that would worry me so much that I'd say anything to talk you down?
Hmm! I, uh, was worried I lost you.
It's just that I worry, you know- your not seeing everything.
I am concerned that you have-- how do I put this?
I'm not worried about you having any of my things.
I'm just worried that it's moving too fast, that's all.
Well, I'm just a little worried that this is too good to be true.
I am concerned that you have-- how do I put this?
If I was worried, I'd ask you what you've got, but I'm not, so I'm just going to assume you've got something, which means you should be worried.
I think we should be a bit worried especially now we know whoever's behind it all is after me.
Please tell me we're done being worried.
When Angel came to my room, he was just really concerned for you.
I'm concerned about your well-being, that's all.
What if I told you that he's very concerned about you?
Why are you so worried about her?
I mean, don't he got any concern for you?
I've just been so worried about her.
I'm concerned about your well-being, that's all.
You're so worried about him, why don't you help?
What if I told you that he's very concerned about you?
Because men your age don't tend to see doctors when you should, and you look extremely worried, so I'm not going to let you leave until you tell me the problem.
Why do you still look so worried?
Well, actually, you bring up a good point because we've never really talked about our past.
We worry about the new missiles.
He was worried about my kids.
If you were worried about your husband and daughter, why didn't you just call us?
I'm just worried about my friend, that's all.
You haven't told her anything about what's going on with me?
I got it, and now they're not asking anymore.
I'm quite concerned, and so should you be.
Well, he told me not to tell his mom, but now I'm worried I should be telling someone, 'cause maybe there's something really wrong with him and he needs help.
